title: Love of the Sea
overview: The series depicts the life of Samuth, the only child in the family whose father is a fisherman and whose family depends on fishing by the sea in Kampot province. One day, he bumps into a young man named Veatu, who later becomes his reliable friend with whom he can share his thoughts. As the two spend time together, just like the waves hit the surface of the sea, an unexpected romance blossoms between them. What will happen when a huge wave comes? Will it wash their relationship away, or will their bond get stronger?
